verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Father we love You
We worship and adore You
Glorify Thy name in all the earth
Glorify Thy name
Glorify Thy name
Glorify Thy name in all the earth

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus we love You
We worship and adore You
Glorify Thy name in all the earth
Glorify Thy name
Glorify Thy name
Glorify Thy name in all the earth

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit we love You
We worship and adore You
Lead us to the Lord and all His ways
Lead us to the Lord
Lead us to the Lord
Lead us to the Lord and all His Ways
